item.title: An inverse 'head-and-shoulders' pattern is forming in this semiconductor stock, charts show
item.description: Frank Cappelleri discusses the technical outlook for this SMH ETF member.

item.title: This quirky growing consumer product stock may get an additional boost from Brad Pitt, according to Bank of America
item.description: Shares of this global product design and technology company could see upside, in part due to Oscar-winning film star Brad Pitt, Bank of America said.

item.title: Trump is right about the Fed needing to lower rates, says Piper Sandler
item.description: Piper Sandler agrees with Donald Trump that the Federal Reserve needs to lower rates, as the president's barbs at Chair Jerome Powell grow louder.

item.title: This tech stock is flashing signs it's ready to roll over. How to profit if it does
item.description: This strategy capitalizes on this stock's valuation risks, heightened debt, competitive pressures, and poor relative strength.

item.title: The two stocks set to benefit most from Trump's 50% copper tariffs, according to Bank of America
item.description: President Donald Trump's abruptly announced tariff sent copper soaring Tuesday, with futures prices closing at the highest level since 1989.
